entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Process.ExitCode` throws `InvalidOperationException` #95831
  • Attempt to use of dynamically creates type in the attribute leads to exception #95829
  • [R2R] Drop inlining observations when inlining is not performed #95815
    9.0.0

Closed

  • DriveInfo.GetDrives() - Linux #95720
    Future
  • Stock Blazor Wasm template throws exception on some Chrome Android devices when AOT enabled #93980
    8.0.x
  • Interop tests crash on Mono #95792
  • FileSystemWatcher Not working when dotnet8 publish with native aot #95811

PullRequests

Created

  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add Configurable Shutdown Delay to ConsoleLifetime #95828
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [Mono][full-aot] Fix runtime invoke with delegate parameter #95824
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Merge more stores/loads #95823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI: Surface failures for MT job when runtime has changes #95817
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump #95816
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: Move to using dotnet test instead of xunit directly #95812
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • JIT: Reuse (new) loop-finding DFS tree in SSA #95809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix location of fgFindJumpTargets comment #95774
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove outdated TODO in JsonWriterHelper.Escaping.cs #95806
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Reenable disabled nativeaot warnings and fix the issues #95698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add flowgraph dumping for new loops #95748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Forgot to call emitOutput_Instr on SVE_GD_2A #95814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: more CSE refactoring #95796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use python venv for SPMI collection / jit rolling build #95714
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable IEnumerator test on Mono #95804
    disabled-test, area-Interop-mono

Updated

  • Respect ResponseHeaderEncodingSelector for the Location header #95810
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make the intermediate output path OS-specific for CoreCLR #95797
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #94388
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #94372
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • JIT: Add explicit successor for BBJ_COND false branch #95773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Integrate dotnet.js into ILCompiler.LLVM #2453
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] JS Interop #2440

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add-Migration not recognized after install of Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools #37205

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • dotnet tool update form private registry fails #37379
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk project is not running as startup project if it resides inside of a solution folder #37024
  • SDK is incorrectly emitted SupportedOSPlatform("Windows7.0") #37220
  • [Broken Build]: Dotnet Publish is not idempotent and deletes required Content #37222
    Discussion
  • Runtime identifier not validated by dotnet build if --no-self-contained is passed #36746
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix typos of Register-ArgumentCompleter parameters #37411
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • init tool list format option #37394
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix stage 2 VMR source-build #37407
    source-build, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot use MSBuildLocator with multiple versions of Visual Studio for different projects #71197
  • Emit length check and Array.Empty when collection-expr may be empty #71194
  • Switch to file-scoped-namespaces in generated syntax files. #71192

Closed

  • nEXT* #71196

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use file scoped namespaces #71193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Update the C# syntax generator to use aliases to lower the amount of large qualified namespaces emitted to distinguish internal and public types. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Make trivial Params Collections scenarios working end to end #71136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Add back request telemetry in CLaSP queue #71157
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • API proposal for an IndentingStringBuilder. #71163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • [WIP] Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure the editorconfig for code-style analysis ("IDExxxx") rules is included #71173
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #71175
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce size of source constructor symbol #71178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove navigation helpers based on line+offset #71184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary check of trailing trivia for directives. #71185
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #52694
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla #52693
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52692
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #52691
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52690
  • Blazor 8 SSR cannot change Pagetitle when StreamRendering is true #52689
  • Continuous browser reloading while navigating within AuthorizeView razor page #52686
  • "Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.DataAnnotations.Validation" is still in preview #52685
  • Chinese characters are encoded incorrectly in .Net 8 Blazor Web App despite using HtmlEncoder.Create(UnicodeRanges.All) #52683
  • UserAuthorizationFailed log message loses information about FailureReasons #52682

Closed

  • bool IDataProtector.TryUnprotect() #51508
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52671

PullRequests

Created

  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Use CreateAsyncScope instead of CreateScope for ExceptionHandler middleware #52687
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Update devcontainer Dockerfile #52681
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52652
    area-hosting
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Revert "Unskip HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported on debian 12 (#52235) #52674
    area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need to add Grid tag to work properly in Android #19319
  • Switch control renders with rectangular frame when toggled #19317

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19316
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to create a composite index with complex property ? #32578
  • Consider having a relational expression representing OPENJSON, json_each and so on #32576
  • Contains translates to correlated query when the item is nullable #32574

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate more information when failing to load EntityTypeConfiguration types #32577
  • Produce uncorrelated IN for Contains with nullable item #32575
  • Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32573

Merged

  • Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32560

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32572
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
